42809.summary: Some customers in the Lower Ten Oaks area of Abbotsford are experiencing an interruption to their  Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42809.title: Oct 09 – Abbotsford (Lower Ten Oaks) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: This interruption is related to a power outage in the area. Our technicians are working to restore service as soon as power has been restored. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates as they become available.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
